## Welcome to Day 1

-   Spatial geostatistical modelling\
-   Spatio-temporal extensions\
-   Malaria data simulated for Nigeria\
-   All modelling uses **UTM coordinates**

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Load the Data






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readr) 
spatial_binom <- read_csv("../data/spatial_binomial_data.csv")
head(spatial_binom)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
